outputs.output_descr: The project aims at supporting the Ministry of Finance in strengthening its Human and Institutional Capacity by establishing a new Management Information System and well function training center. The training center will have a structures and capacity to conduct and extend training programs to MoF , Regional Offices  and other public institutions. The new IT system also will assist the Ministry to collect and analysis data

project_descr: The project aims at supporting the Ministry of Finance in strengthening its Human and Institutional Capacity by establishing a new Management Information System and well function training center.
project_title: Support to Capacity Building of the Ministry of Finance
